1.0.2.name: wordpress/post-anonymously
1.0.2.description: Easy way to allow your site members to post and comment anonymously while logged in. It adds a checkbox to the 'Add Post' form, which allows to remove the author name when publishing the post. It also displays a 'Post Anonymously' checkbox in the comment form so that your blog member can choose to comment as 'anonymous'. Easy to use, and good for its purpose.
